searchKeywords.description: Enter a search term just like you would enter it in YouTube's search bar.

maxResults.description: Limit the number of videos you want to crawl. If you scrape a channel, acts as a limit for regular videos.

maxResultsShorts.description: Limit the number of Shorts videos you want to crawl.

maxResultStreams.description: Limit the number of Stream videos you want to crawl.

startUrls.description:
Enter a link to a YouTube video, channel, playlist or search results page. You can also import a CSV file or Google Sheet with a list of URLs.
Note: Input from Search term will be ignored when using t

downloadSubtitles.description: If set to true, the scraper will download subtitles for the video and convert them to .srt format.

saveSubsToKVS.description:
If set to true, the scraper will save the downloaded subtitles to the key-value store.
Note: Download subtitles must be turned on for this option to work.

subtitlesLanguage.description:
Language to download subtitles in.
Note: Download subtitles must be turned on for this option to work.

preferAutoGeneratedSubtitles.description: If set to true, automatically generated subtitles are preferred to user subtitles.Note: A subtitle language must be selected for this option to work.

subtitlesFormat.description: Select in what format you want to download subtitles

sortingOrder.description: Select Youtube sorting parameter for search

dateFilter.description: Select Youtube upload date filter for search

videoType.description: Select Youtube video type filter for search

lengthFilter.description: Select Youtube video length filter for search

isHD.description: Will apply the HD filter for search

hasSubtitles.description: Will apply the Subtitles/CC filter for search

hasCC.description: Will apply the Creative Commons filter for search

is3D.description: Will apply the 3D filter for search

isLive.description: Will apply the Live filter for search

isBought.description: Will apply the Purchased filter for search

is4K.description: Will apply the 4K filter for search

is360.description: Will apply the 360 degrees filter for search

hasLocation.description: Will apply the Location filter for search

isHDR.description: Will apply the HDR filter for search

isVR180.description: Will apply the VR180 filter for search

oldestPostDate.description: Only posts uploaded after or on this date will be scraped. Note, that if you select this, sorting parameter will be auto-reset to NEWEST

scrapeLastNDays.description: Specify how old scraped videos can be (in days). Putting 1 will get you only today's videos, 2 - tomorrow's and today's, and so on. If the Only newer than field was set, the most recent one will be ch

sortVideosBy.description: Maps to the three sorting buttons on the top of the channel videos page. Currently only applies to the main tab: Videos.
